children.text: The window frame in this area has not been installed in the location as documented on the drawings we have been provided with.

For your builder to reach completion, at which point they are entitled to receive final payment, they must have completed all of their requirements under the Building Act and provided you with a copy of the Occupancy Permit. They must also have completed your home in a proper and workmanlike manner and in accordance with the plans and specifications.

Until the builder has achieved full compliance with these warranties, the works remain incomplete, and the builder would not be entitled to receive final payment. The incorrectly installed window frame item documented above must be properly addressed by your builder for your home to reach completion.
